name: The Book of Pedro
description:
In the mythical land of Mathimalandia, all battles are fought with the use of knowledge in basic mathematics. You will play as Pedro, half-human half-fairy and you have to fight monsters with the use of his magical book to save Pedro’s father that had been kidnapped by the evil King Engkanto.

Pedro with the use of his magical book harness the power of four elements fire, water, air, and earth. Monsters in mathimalandia also possesses one element of power and you have to figure out the monster’s weakness and the player has to decide what type of element the he/she should use to have an advantage to the monster.

This is my first published game so feedback and comments are very much appreciated.
